eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager.ingested.lookup

Class Word2VectorTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager.ingested.lookup.Word2VectorTransformer

  • public class Word2VectorTransformer
extends Object
    Implements a Word2Vector transformer for sets of keywords (tokens) into a vector of numerical values. It makes use of a user-specified dictionary with vector representations for a vocabulary of individual words.

      • Word2VectorTransformer

        public Word2VectorTransformer(Map<String,double[]> vectorDictionary,
                              int sizeVector)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        vectorDictionary - The dictionary of vectors corresponding to words in a vocabulary.

    • Method Detail

      • getVector

        public double[] getVector(String[] tokens)
        Provides a vector for the given array of tokens (keywords) based on their representations in the dictionary.
        Parameters:
        tokens - An array of string values (e.g., a set of keywords).
        Returns:
        A vector representation for the given array.

      • apply

        public Map<String,Point> apply(Map<String,String[]> inData)
        Apply transformation on the given dataset of sets of keywords.
        Parameters:
        inData - The input dataset of sets of keywords (each with a unique identifier as key).
        Returns:
        The output dataset of transformed vectors representated as multi-dimensional points (using the same identifiers as keys and double ordinates in each value).
